notes: Modern Horizons 2 (MH2) support.
Re-worked disconnected user display/draft pause to allow interracting with the rest of the application.
Tweak bracket display.
Updated card zoom on right-click to be more legible.
Double elimination brackets.
Improved spectator view for organizer.
Fixed a bug in STX collation when Lessons in collection(s) were insufficient.
Download Session Collection Tool.
Many cosmetic tweaks.
STA/STX bot ratings.
Setting Rare booster content to zero will now also prevent lessons/mystical archives from STX to be rares.
Tried to improve the reconnect mechanism.
Expanded last picks reminder to Rochester Draft.
Added last picks reminder in Grid Draft.
Tweaked Strixhaven pack collation.
Minor improvements to the search feature.
Strixhaven: School of Mages support.
Search in deck/sideboard feature.
Made exact card version (set & collector number) matching optional when importing cubes from Cube Cobra to improve compatibility with MTGA by default.
Front-end support for flip, split and meld cards.
Time Spiral Remastered support.
Tweaked booster passing animations.
Import exact cards (matching set and collector number) from Cube Cobra when possible.
Added pre-determined boosters support.
Implemented wildcard tracking while drafting and brewing.
Added a reminder of the number of owned copies of each card while drafting (when applicable and if a MTGA Collection has been uploaded). Can be disabled in the Collection statistics panel.
Extended logs to other game modes.
Collection viewer updated for Kaldheim.
Added preliminary Kaldheim support.
Minor bug fixes.
Added a way to customize the set of each booster of a sealed pool individually.
New Layout menu.
Added a Two Rows layout option, reserving the first row to creatures.
Improved sorting: More consistent and correctly used when inserting new cards.
Added optional column header displaying cards count and sort information.
Added a way to remove basic lands from the card pool (so all basics can be controled from the menu).
Happy new year :]
Player count and some notifications in page title.
Multiple small bug fixes.
Added a crude import deck list feature.
Added December 2020 Arena Cube.
Optimizations and visual tweaks.
Fixed a collation bug.
Updated basic land controls.
Kaladesh Remastered support.
Implemented support for cards outside of MtG: Arena! Try drafting some Mystery Boosters or any Vintage Cube!
Allow for multiple picks per pack, Commander Legends will be playable as intended!
Updated the Draft Logs to support the new features, older logs needs to be converted to the new format.
New fancy foil effect.
Tweaked how decks are displayed to accomodate a wider range of screen resolutions.
Zendikar Rising support!
Added a Draft Log History storing up to 25 logs.
Added a Team Draft option for 6 players with matching bracket (Contribution from Squerp).
Sideboard can now be minimized to a single column to the right of the deck.
Added a way to display the back of Double-Faced cards in prevision of Zendikar Rising Modal DFC (MDFC).
Optimized the collection statistics panel and added options 'All' and 'Standard'.
Implemented Rochester Draft.
Implemented Grid Draft as a 2-player variant for drafting cubes.
Implemented set specific collation rules for boosters: One Planeswalker per War of the Spark pack, one Legendary Creature per Dominaria pack.
Cards can be zoomed-in by right clicking.
Added sort by card type.
Added some basic statistics about your deck (Mana curve, color and type distribution).
Added 'Random Set from Card Pool' option for individual boosters.
Added link to a read-only version of the bracket to share with non-players.
Updated landing page.
Added Jumpstart cards and gamemode.
Added 3-Round Swiss support (by Squerp).
Cards from booster can now be picked by drag & drop.
Added 'Export (Simple)' option to export deck and sideboard without set information (Useful to make better use of your existing collection in Arena or to import in other programs).
Added JiRock's Historic Cube to the preset list.
Bots should be slightly less dumb when drafting M21.
Minor style changes.
Added sort by color and rarity.
Improved Edge compatibility.
Minor front-end changes.
Improved default card sorting (thanks Squerp!)
Removed display options other than draggable and added a manual re-sorting.
Added M21 cards (most images are only available in English for now)
Added cube presets (Only the Arena Cube for now, more to come!).
Added a cube view, with information about the missing cards in user's collection.
Lazy loading of languages.
A lot of Front-End rewrite and slight optimizations.
Added Distribution Mode option when using boosters from different sets.
Added option to customize the content of boosters (replaces Maximum Rarity).
Updated tooltips.
Added Individual Booster Restrictions option (Chaos Draft).
Minor style updates.
Back end optimizations.
Updated card data with Historic Anthology 3 cards.
'output_log.txt' is now 'Player.log'.
Owner can now take the role of a non-playing draft organizer.
Non-playing owner can review players picks during the draft!
Added Burned Cards per Round option to play Glimpse/Burn Draft.
Updated cube list format with support for more parameters (count, set, collector number).
Updated Cube Format Specifications accordingly.
Implemented Winston Draft.
Various Fixes.
Players can now be re-ordered by drag & drop.
Handle importing logs with collections from multiple accounts.
Added an option to randomize seating order.
Added simple bracket generation (pairings).
Added card rating for Ikoria (Bot should be just a little less dumb).
Added CMC Columns display option for cards in draft logs.
Various stability improvements.
Added specific land slot rules when a single set is selected.
Added Ikoria basic support.
Foils are now disabled by default (option is still available).
Fixed missing card when importing collection.
Improved card image loading.
Added support for a custom cube format for more control over your boosters.
Can remove draggable column.
Added some disableable sounds. I hate them, please contact me if you can help me! :D
Draft log is now saved locally until a new one is received
Added an option to open saved draft logs
Session owner can re-order the table
Minor style changes
Fixed some images.
Improved bot ordering.
Bug fixes.
Improved/Fixed card database.
Fixed Conflux card exporting.
Draggable cards option in deck builder.
Added a Color Columns option to display cards.
Added a Ready Check for the session owner.
Updated draft logs. Complete pick information. Can now be exported in MTGO format/to MagicProTools.
Fix: No more undesirable duplicates from the use of Color Balancing.
Fix: Crash on reconnection.
Fix: Correctly handle duplicates in Custom Card Lists.
Fix: Correctly export split cards from Ravnica.
Added a delayed draft log sharing option. Useful for tournament settings.
Added a stop draft button for the owner.
Updated visual of pick timer countdown.
Draft logs can now be disabled or exclusive to the owner.
Updated Draft Log with a table display.
Display disconnected user name.
